Constructor Detail

ShiftRegister

public ShiftRegister(int n)
Parameters:
n - - Size of the register.
Throws:
IllegalArgument - exception if you attempt to enter n that is not 8,16, or 32.

ShiftRegister

public ShiftRegister(ShiftRegister slr)
Parameters:
slr - - Will do a deep copy of the register input.
Method Detail

shiftLeft

public boolean shiftLeft()
Returns:
will return the boolean value of the bit shifted off the end of the array.

shiftRight

public boolean shiftRight()
Returns:
the right most bit shifted off. Be careful implementing this function. If the left most bit is a 1, then you NEED to copy a 1 to the new shifted value as well.
